name: JWT HttpOnly Cookie 전환
prompt: Authorization 헤더 기반 JWT 토큰 전달을 HttpOnly Cookie 방식으로 완전 전환. CookieProperties/CookieHelper 신규 생성, JwtAuthenticationFilter/ConcurrentLoginFilter/AuthControllerV1/UserControllerV1/SignInUserResponse/SecurityConfig 수정.
summary: JWT 토큰 전달 방식을 Authorization 헤더에서 HttpOnly Cookie로 완전 전환 완료. CookieProperties/CookieHelper 신규 생성, JwtAuthenticationFilter/ConcurrentLoginFilter/AuthControllerV1/StoreLoginControllerV1/UserControllerV1/SignInUserResponse/SecurityConfig/application.yml 수정.
author: default
